name: Robotica (PEPIISDED)
description:
Robotica is a game where the world is destroyed beacouse of robots, and you are the only one who can save the world!

Controls:

        -w, a and d for moving

        -s is for crouching, and entering teleporters (teleporters sometimes lag so                              try holding the s key)

        -press the space bar to jump

        -press I for inventory, and number 1 for using the first slot

        -click anywhere on the screen to shoot
